Mary Matthews is a sweet little girl living a very ordinary life until the fish girl appeared to her one night in her bedroom. The bizarre creatureÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s prophecies that Mary alone can save the fish girlÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s world terrifies her.

The following day, Mary is on a fieldtrip with her class when a voice beckons to her from an alley.
